title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 189: Featuring Jeff Marek
description:
On Tuesday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Jeff Marek of Sportsnet to talk all things NHL Free Agency. The guys break down all the major signings and recap all the big trades while also touching on their trip to Halifax and RA's side trip to Montreal. The guys give a sneak peak of some of their content that will drop with Sidney Crosby and Nathan MacKinnon as well.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
